name: get_tile
example_comment: The above snippet returns a the <%=tile%> to the left of this one.
description: Returns a <%=tile%> offset in one direction from this <%=tile%>.
If this offset goes out of bounds, or is to an otherwise invalid <%=tile%>, it returns `nil` instead.

parameters.name: direction
parameters.desc: The direction you want to retrieve the <%=tile%> from.

parameters.name: distance
parameters.desc: The number of spaces (min: 0) in that direction you want to retrieve the <%=tile%> from.
